"Murriah": "Thanks to you, I can start to move on."
"I will do my utmost! Thank you!"
"Thanks to you, I'm almost ready to return to battle..."
"...But there is still something holding me back. Would you be willing to lend your aid yet again?"
"Could you take them out in my stead once more?"
"I know it is a brazen request to make, but you are the only one I can ask."
"I see, you must be terribly busy... Please let me know, should you change your mind."
